name: The Slimes From Below
description:
REQUIRES XBOX 360 CONTROLLER

REQUIRED DIRECTX11

NOTE: This game was made in under 48 hours for the Alberta Game Jam - Calgary Event on Aug 23 to Aug 25 2019

Delve into an unknown mysterious catacomb infested with SLIMES! as the one and only Slime Slayer, it's up to you to brave 3 EXTREME ONE ROOM LEVELS and take on the deadly Slime King.
